__e: And now one of you has betrayed her and stolen something from her... a key.
If you hadn't cheated on me... And lied to me all these years. None of this would have ever happened.
You asked me if he was having an affair, and I said that he wasn't.
I wasn't cheating on you, if that's what you're getting at.
Had a husband and a kid, and he cheated on me with some crazy woman.
I'm sorry he cheated on me with you, and I'm sorry that I pretended to ignore it for as long as I did.
